      • TicTacToeGame

        public TicTacToeGame(Player[] p)
        Creates a 3 by 3 TicTacToe Game board. Sets moveCounter to 0. Imports a couple of players.
        Parameters:
        p - length 2 array of Player

      • TicTacToeGame

        public TicTacToeGame(Player[] p,
                     boolean verbose)
        Creates a 3 by 3 TicTacToe Game board. Sets moveCounter to 0. Imports a couple of players.
        Parameters:
        p - length 2 array of Player
        verbose - true if this class should print console output for every move
